description:
Unlock ChatGPT's Full Potential with Real-Time Streaming! 🚀

This game-changing plugin offers seamless access to all of ChatGPT's capabilities through a simple, no-code interface.

- Access 15+ models via OpenRouter for specialized responses 🤖
- Integrate any model from OpenAI and other compatible endpoints 🔌
- Experience real-time conversations without lags or delays ⚡️  
- Monitor usage and fine-tune streaming with granular controls 📈
- Completely customize your AI experience for diverse applications ✨

Whether you're creating assistants, generating content, or exploring AI's boundaries, this plugin empowers endless possibilities:

- Build intricate chatbots with conversational flows 🤝
- Rapidly answer queries across countless domains 💡
- Automate diverse processes with custom logic ⚙️
- Creatively expand your content strategy 📝
- Optimize interactions by steering model behavior 🎯
- Generate code, summarize data, moderate content, and more! 🔧

Simply install and configure settings - no coding needed. 👩‍💻 Now you can tap into the full spectrum of AI capabilities in real time. Upgrade your project today! 🆙

Sponsored by https://CoAlias.com/
name: AI Proxy - Streaming of 13 models
plugin_instructions:
1. Go to https://nocodesaastoolbox.com/

2. Login with your emailadres. You will get a email with a link to login.

3. Click on Add app. Add your app url like https://bubble.io/ and press Add.

4. Click on Show Client ID & Secret. Fill in your Client ID and Client Secret into the plugin.

View how it works on: https://ai-proxy-sample.bubbleapps.io/version-test

Check the editor for a sample: https://bubble.io/page?name=index&type=page&id=ai-proxy-sample&tab=tabs-1

or view the tutorial on: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KU59HsPL3OY
